Control Name: 5.11.6 Expiry dates of SSL/TLS certificates are monitored and there are renewal processes in place.
Control Statement: Expired SSL/TLS certificates are one of the most common yet avoidable causes of application outages; even Azure and more recently Microsoft Teams have experienced outages due to expired certificates.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.11 Are keys, secrets and certificates managed in a secure way?
control_attributes.Control: 5.11.6 Expiry dates of SSL/TLS certificates are monitored and there are renewal processes in place.
control_attributes.Description: Expired SSL/TLS certificates are one of the most common yet avoidable causes of application outages; even Azure and more recently Microsoft Teams have experienced outages due to expired certificates.
